item.title: Tree roots outside 26 Orchard Road, N6 5TR, 4th September
item.description:
Probably due to climate change the tree outside my property has caused soil shrinkage. In the pictures you can see that the roots have lifted the pavement in the direction of my property. I've just replaced the entrance path to my property which was damaged by roots and I'm finding that movement caused by the roots means that my front door keeps sticking. I'm worried that serious subsidence problems may occur if the issue is not resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Orchard Road, Crouch End, London
Report on FixMyStreet
